publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2563 Cathy Jamieson: Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*, Ms Margaret Curran*

S1M-2563 Cathy Jamieson: Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Nicol Stephen, Ms Margaret Curran
